name: Light Runner (Chao, LlordDominik, ChaosFusion)
description:
You've been locked in a warehouse after hours, time to find your keys and get the heck out of there.

Some parts of the levels are poorly lit, so you might need to turn on switches and move some lights around to add a bit of... illumination to the situation.

Made for Global Game Jam 2021: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/light-runner-7

Stewart Grant - Game Design & Programming

Russell Hodges - Sound Mixing & Audio Design

Jesse Lloyde-Dominik - Game Design & Technical Artist

Scott Neely - 3D Artist & Animator

Andrew Wilson - Level Design & Programming
